title: Matakeo: Echoes of the Future
description: Matakeo Darius is summoned to solve a murder of an old friend and soon discovers that the evidence spans the galaxy; can he solve the murder by piecing together the galactic clues? Darius Talek continued a rigorous regimen of physical conditioning after being ousted from the Order of Matakeo, hopeful to someday be exonerated and reinstated. He is informed of the murder of a priest, a mentor and friend. After examining the crime scene, he goes in pursuit of a incompetent witness who he believes can solve a simple murder by telling him who the suspect is.
author: Daniel L. Newcomb
